renderpass.code:
// golfed variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/lljSDy

#define mainImage(O,u)                          \
                                                \
    float r =.2, t=iTime, H=iResolution.y, i=r; \
    vec2  U =  u/H, f,                          \
          P = .5+.5* cos(vec2(t,t*.7+11.));     \
    for ( O.b = .25 ; ++i < 8. ;                \
        min(f.x,f.y) < 3.*r/H    ?  O--         \
    	: length(P-1.) - r < 1.4 ?              \
        	  f = 2.*step(1.,U),                \
        	  U += U - f,                       \
        	  P += P - f,  r += r,              \
        	  O += .13                          \
        : O )                                   \
        f = min( U, 2.-U ),                     \
	length(P-U) < r ? O.gb-- : U               /*






// --- 250 chars ( 2018 version )

#define mainImage(O,u)                          \
                                                \
    float r=.2, t=iTime, H=iResolution.y, i=0.; \
    vec2 U =  u/H, f,                           \
         P = .5+.5* vec2(cos(t),sin(t*.7));     \
                                                \
    for ( O.b = .25; i<7.; i++ )                \
        f = min( U, 2.-U ),                     \
        min(f.x,f.y) < 3.*r/H    ?  O--         \
    	: length(P-1.) - r < 1.4 ?              \
        	  f = 2.*step(1.,U),                \
        	  U += U - f,                       \
        	  P += P - f,  r += r,              \
        	  O += .13                          \
        : O;                                    \
	length(P-U) < r ? O.gb-- : U               /*

/**/
renderpass.name: Image
